saas.name: Hello World!
saas.heading: Nala is a baby kitten
saas.subheading: She is perfect in every way and loves doing kitty things like taking naps and such.

features.title: Simple
features.desc: We only focus on doing one thing well and keeping things as simple as possible.

features.title: Get Going Fast
features.desc: Try out the API for FREE and then sign up with your GitHub account and Stripe.

features.title: Cost Effective
features.desc: Building on top of serverless functions means you'll only pay for the API calls you actually use.

features.title: Documentation
features.desc: Thorough docs that come with easy-to-use examples for many common programming languages.

features.title: Robust
features.desc: Serverless functions enable new levels of scalability and robustness against spikes in traffic.

features.title: Versioned
features.desc: All APIs are immutable and newer versions are always opt-in.

features.title: Trusted
features.desc: Our team has worked at some of the largest tech companies in the world including Facebook, Microsoft, and Netflix.

features.title: Secure
features.desc: We take security very seriously. All of our APIs are vetted by an independent third-party for compliance.

features.title: Support
features.desc: In addition to standard email support, we offer live chat during US office hours as well as an extensive FAQ.

features.title: Enterprise
features.desc: For questions regarding bulk pricing, dedicated support, customization, self-hosting, or other enterprise considerations, please contact us below.

deployment.readme:
# Hello World

This is a very simple Fin project with a single serverless function that implements the classic "Hello World!".
